name: protector
effect: Held by Rhydon: Evolves the holder into Rhyperior when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Rhydon: Holder evolves into Rhyperior.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A protective item of some sort.
It is extremely stiff and heavy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
